text: Yi bo la xin he ta de jiaotu, shi nimen de hao mu fan. Dangshi, tamen ceng dui ziji de zongzu shuo:â€œWomen duiyu nimen, he nimen she an la er chongbai de, que shi wugan de, women bu chengren nimen. Women bici jian de chouhen, yongyuan cunzai. Zhidao nimen zhi xinyang an la. Dan yi bo la xin dui ta fuqin suo shuo dehua,(buke zuo nimen de mofan). Ta ceng shuo: Wo biding wei ni qiurao, wo buneng wei ni diyu an la de yixie xingfa. Tamen ceng shuo: Women de zhu a! Women zhi tuo kao ni, women zhi guiyi ni, zhiyou ni shi zuihou de guisu
